channel.title: [PI] Timer [PI] need help

item.title: [PI] Timer [PI] need help
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

The timer on this npc is not working,

Code:

case 239: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.buydelay < 200000) { // 24 hours c.buydelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().addItem(620,1200); c.sendMessage("You Have gotten 1200 tickets."); } else { //<<< When I add that c.sendMessage("Please Wait 24 hours to get tickets."); } break;
Is is suppose to be, if player clicks on the npc first it will give 1200 tickets then you have to wait 24 hours, but even after those 24 hours are done, it still doesn't let you take more tickets....

Read full topic
